A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Please don’t let the negative fan reviews dissuade you from seeing this movie. Form your own opinion by going to watch it. Personally I loved it! Yeah sure\, there are aspects that make you go “huh\, that was unexpected”\, and yes\, you will be confused. But don’t forget\, this is the 2nd movie in a TRILOGY! Meaning questions that this movie creates\, and questions you still have from TFA will be answered in the next instalment. Also\, if you find yourself asking “WHO IS SNOKE?”\, think back to the original trilogy... were we ever told who The Emperor was? And did it really matter? If you go in with an open mind\, and you are a TRUE Star Wars fan\, you’re going to love this movie. (Be ready for surprises)
